data.actual_result: A single frame of the window is captured, and streams that, with the cursor able to move.
data.short_description: Window'd Fullscreen in Unreal Engine games don't stream over screenshare when using Application Share
data.steps_to_repro: - Run a game using the Unreal Engine (Fortnite and Paragon were tested, latter is F2P) - Start a Video Call - Share Game as Application
